user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe and I want to explore the historical ESG scores for companies in 2020. Can you provide me with the historical ESG scores for Apple Inc., along with the list of supported currencies? Additionally, I need the latest stock news.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the historical ESG scores for Apple Inc. for the year 2020.
Get the list of supported currencies for financial transactions.
Fetch the latest stock news related to Apple Inc.
